Found this tapas bar on Yelp and was very pleased.  Service was very friendly and efficient.  Tapas can be ordered from menu or selected from trays of food sitting on bar.  Don't go crazy with the menu because the tapas on the bar are amazing!  Items are heated up as necessary after you put them on your plate and your bill is calculated by how many skewers you collect.  I will definitely come back the next time I'm in Barcelona.
